title: Phantasmal Sphere
text: FlyingAt the beginning of your upkeep, put a +1/+1 counter on Phantasmal Sphere, then sacrifice Phantasmal Sphere unless you pay  for each +1/+1 counter on it.When Phantasmal Sphere leaves the battlefield, target opponent puts an X/X blue Orb creature token with flying onto the battlefield, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Phantasmal Sphere.
